programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Corbomite Maneuver
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Kirk bluffs his way past what appears to be a powerful alien.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Menagerie, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Spock hijacks the Enterprise to return an injured Captain Pike to Talos IV.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Menagerie, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Spock hijacks the Enterprise to return an injured Captain Pike to Talos IV.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Conscience Of The King
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 Kirk is one of the last survivors who can identify a mass killer, who lurks among a Shakespearean troupe aboard the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Balance Of Terror
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 The Enterprise must decide on its response when a Romulan ship makes a destructively hostile armed probe of Federation territory.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Shore Leave
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 A U.S.S. Enterprise landing party beams down to an uncharted planet. The planet seems like a perfect candidate for shore leave with its "Earth-type" characteristics.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Galileo Seven
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 Spock commands a stranded away team when their shuttlecraft is stranded on a planet with hostile natives.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Squire Of Gothos
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 17 A powerful entity known as Trelane torments the crew of the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Arena
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 The U.S.S. Enterprise is in pursuit of an unknown alien ship which has destroyed a Starfleet base.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Tomorrow Is Yesterday
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 The U.S.S. Enterprise is thrown into a time warp and ends up orbiting Earth in the 20th century.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Court Martial
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 Captain Kirk's career is at stake when he is put on trial for the loss of a crewman during an ion storm.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Return Of The Archons
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 21 The Enterprise encounters a seemingly peaceful civilization run by a "benevolent" being named Landru...who intends for them to join his people.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Space Seed
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 22 Kirk meets Khan, a notorious dictator, and leader of Earth's Eugenics War.

programme.title: Delete - Delete: Part 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A terrorist threat goes viral, plunging our world into chaos and pitting it against an enemy we never anticipated.

programme.title: Delete - Delete: Part 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A terrorist threat goes viral, plunging our world into chaos and pitting it against an enemy we never anticipated.

programme.title: Beta Test - Beta Test
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a gamer discovers that the events in a video game are happening in the real world, he must join forces with the game's protagonist to unravel the sinister plot before it overwhelms the city.

programme.title: Plan 9 From Outer Space - Plan 9 From Outer Space
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Aliens from outer space reanimate the Earth's dead in an attempt to save the human race. Ed Wood's cult classic - Restored and In Color!

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 120 - Corporate Raiders
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 The city is rocked by anti-corporate violence as RoboCop and Officer Madigan are assigned to bring in a charming ex-terrorist, but a corrupt union leader and his sultry secretary have other plans.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 121 - Public Enemies
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 21 RoboCop must save the President and First Gentleman from an assassination plot hatched by Dr. Mallardo, Chip Chayken, and Pudface Morgan.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 122 - Midnight Minus One
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 22 RoboCop and Officer Madigan race the clock to prove a killer is innocent before he is executed in front of millions of viewers on a hit television show.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Probe 7, Over and Out
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 The lone survivors of two annihilated worlds are stranded on a distant planet.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The 7th is Made Up of Phantoms
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 Three National Guardsmen explore the site of Custer's Last Stand and encounter mysterious phenomenon that hint at the original battle occurring just out of sight.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Short Drink from a Certain Fountain
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 Trying to keep up with his younger wife, Harmon convinces his brother to inject him with an experimental youth serum.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Ninety Years Without Slumbering
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 An old man fears that he will die if his grandfather clock stops running.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Ring-A-Ding Girl
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 Bunny receives a ring from her fan club in her home town. In the ring she sees the faces of people from her hometown telling her she's needed there so she returns home.

programme.title: The First 48 - Frenzy / Hard Truth
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 3 In Miami, Sgt. Louis Melancon and Det. Carlos Castellanos investigate the murder of two men savagely gunned down in the middle of a residential street. Detectives learn that a roommate of the two victims is missing.

programme.title: The First 48 - Up in Flames / Drive-By
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 12 In Birmingham, Detectives Jerry Williams and Chris Anderson investigate the murder of man found dead in the back of his burning pick-up truck. With most of the physical evidence destroyed, detectives must track down the people who were last seen.

programme.title: The First 48 - Brothers Down
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 13 In Tulsa, two brothers are shot down after checking on their night cleaning crew. Detectives struggle to find a motive before the killer strikes again.

programme.title: The First 48 - Taken
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 2 When a young man and his pregnant fiance are executed after a failed ransom attempt, Atlanta Homicide will stop at nothing to identify the elusive suspect.

programme.title: The First 48: The First 48: Last Fare (S7E107) - The First 48: Last Fare (S7E107)
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 1 In Tucson, detectives are called to investigate the homicide of a 27-year-old cab driver and father-to-be. In what appears to be a random crime with no leads, the case takes a turn when a surprise tip leads to the whereabouts of their suspects.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bail Out / Seeing Red
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 9 In Dallas, Detectives Scott Sayers and Ken Penrod are investigating a home invasion that left a young man dead.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bail Out / Seeing Red

programme.title: The First 48 - Frenzy / Hard Truth

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Hunt for Brianna Denison
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 301 The investigation into Brianna’s kidnapping and murder and how exemplary police work, alongside forensics identified her killer and brought him to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Mapping a Murder
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 302 Mapping a Murder follows the groundbreaking investigation into the murder of Dr. Teresa Sievers, which pioneered a forensic technique that mapped the killing and solved the case.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Monsterous Murder in Morena
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 304 Monstrous Murder in Morena follows the investigation into the brutal rape and murder of Angela Kleinsorge and how a dedicated police team and cutting-edge forensics solved her crime after 25 years.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Fridge Killer
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 305 The Fridge Killer is the tragic story of a number of innocent victims and how forensic techniques finally led detectives to uncover one of the most cruel and sadistic serial killers in US history.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Deadly Sleep
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 306 The Search for Lori Hacking follows the investigation into Lori’s disappearance and how a multitude of forensic techniques revealed the events of her murder and brought her killer to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Greens Prairie Murder
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 307 Greens Prairie Murder tells the story of Virginia Freeman, the exhaustive investigation into her murder and how, after nearly four decades, police were finally able to solve the case.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Zombiecon Shooting
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 308 Zombiecon Shooting tracks the two-a-half-year investigation into the crime and how the FBI and FMPD identified the killer and brought him to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Conned to Death
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 309 The death of Michele MacNeill, and how her family, determined to get justice for her, led investigators to finally uncover the incredible circumstances surrounding her murder.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Terror on Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 310 Terror on Thanksgiving follows the police and forensics investigation that solves the heartrending murder of Kelsey Berreth.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Murder of Susannah Chase
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 311 The Murder of Susannah Chase follows the investigation into Susannah’s murder, and how law enforcement and forensics eventually tracked down her killer after more than two decades.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Hitchhike Horror
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 312 Hitchhike Horror is the story of Jeannie Moore, the almost 40 year investigation into her murder and how it became the first case in Colorado to be solved with a revolutionary forensics technique.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Rubbermaid Box
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 313 The Rubbermaid Box is the story of Carolyn Jansen, the mysterious circumstances surrounding her murder and how cutting-edge forensics and dedicated investigators eventually caught-up with her killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Moonlight Intruder
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 314 The story of Ronda Guzman, the terrifying rape and lasting impact it has had on her life, and the dedicated investigators who, with forensic advances, revealed the identity of her attacker.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - What You Leave Behind, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 26 The war against the Dominion reaches its final confrontation when Sisko leads the Federation Alliance in an attempt to invade the homeworld.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Caretaker, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 While searching for a missing officer, Captain Kathryn Janeway and the crew of the Starship Voyager are swept 70,000 light years from home.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Caretaker, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The Voyager crew launches a daring rescue mission to save two officers trapped in a subterranean city facing disaster.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Parallax
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Tensions rise between the merged Starfleet and Maquis crews when the ship becomes trapped inside a star that's collapsed upon itself.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Time And Again
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 When Paris and Janeway are sent back in time, they must decide whether to violate the Prime Directive by warning residents of a planet facing annihilation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Phage
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Neelix faces certain death when an alien race stricken by a devastating plague "harvests" his lungs.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Cloud
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 The crew discovers that a nebula is not what it seems, and Paris invites his fellow officers to share a little "R&R" in his holodeck program.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Eye Of The Needle
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 The discovery of a wormhole in deep space raises the crew's hopes of finding a shortcut home.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Ex Post Facto
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 After Paris is convicted of a murder he swears he didn't commit, Tuvok must play detective to clear him.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Emanations
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Kim confronts life and death issues when he's held against his will by an alien race.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Prime Factors
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 An alien leader has the technology that could send the crew 40,000 light years closer to home -- but refuses to share it with them.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - State Of Flux
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The crew realizes there's a traitor on board after Federation technology turns upon an enemy warship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Heroes And Demons
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Janeway sends the ship's doctor on his first Away Mission: rescue the crew members who have vanished in the holodeck's version of Beowulf.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues
